document_name: Law on privileging the use of electric vehicles (Electromobility Act - EmoG)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DEU/2015/DEU-2015-05-06-Law on privileging the use of electric vehicles (Electromobility Act - EmoG)_f203c038ad5b0b78cdaa92ea4cb58835.pdf
document_description: This law introduces measures to favour the uptake of electric and hybrid vehicles through a range of privileges.
